Tercen Operator encyclopedia Preface

basic-statistics.html

1 Basic statistics max_operator upperandlowerbounds_operator median_operator percentile_operator sd_operator cv_operator pearson_operator sum_operator count_operator IQR_operator mean_operator mean_sd_operator

1 Basic statistics max_operator Description: max operator returns the max of a set of data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/max_operator upperandlowerbounds_operator Description: upperandlowerbounds operator computes an upper and lower bound values as a fraction of a given data point. Link: https://github.com/tercen/upperandlowerbounds_operator median_operator Description: Median operator returns the median of a set of data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/median_operator percentile_operator Description: percentile operator returns the percentile of a set of data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/percentile_operator sd_operator Description: sd operator computes the standard deviation of a set of data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/sd_operator cv_operator Description: cv operator calculates the coefficient of variance on a set of input values. Link: https://github.com/tercen/cv_operator pearson_operator Description: pearson operator performs a person correlation of two input sets of data per cell Link: https://github.com/tercen/pearson_operator sum_operator Description: sum operator computes the sum of a set of data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/sum_operator count_operator Description: count operator counts the number of data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/count_operator IQR_operator Description: The IQR operator returns the interquartile range of a set of data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/IQR_operator mean_operator Description: mean operator computes the mean of a set of data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/mean_operator mean_sd_operator Description: mean sd operator computes the mean and standard deviation of a set of data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/mean_sd_operator
basic-data-transformation.html
2 Basic data transformation shift_operator asinh_operator signchange_operator

2 Basic data transformation shift_operator Description: shift operator performs a shift by a constant value. Link: https://github.com/tercen/shift_operator asinh_operator Description: asinh operator performs an inverse hyperbolic sine of values. Link: https://github.com/tercen/asinh_operator signchange_operator Description: signchange operator negates the data value, i.e. sign changes Link: https://github.com/tercen/signchange_operator
basic-operations.html
3 Basic operations sample_operator subtract_operator constant_operator product_operator randomlabel_operator topn_operator annotation_operator wordcount_operator ratio_operator seqlen_operator

3 Basic operations sample_operator Description: Sample operator returns a sample of the specified size from the set of data points using either with or without replacement. Link: https://github.com/tercen/sample_operator subtract_operator Description: subtract operator computes the subtract of two data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/subtract_operator constant_operator Description: constant operator allows for a value equal to a constant to be generated Link: https://github.com/tercen/constant_operator product_operator Description: product operator computes the product (i.e. multiplication) of a set of points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/product_operator randomlabel_operator Description: The Random label operator returns a random label per column. It allows one to subsample or downsample the data. Link: https://github.com/tercen/randomlabel_operator topn_operator Description: topn operator returns data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/topn_operator annotation_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/annotation_operator wordcount_operator Description: Word count operator count the occurences of each words in one or more documents. Link: https://github.com/tercen/wordcount_operator ratio_operator Description: ratio operator computes the ratio of two data points. Link: https://github.com/tercen/ratio_operator seqlen_operator Description: Seqlen operator creates a sequence annotation for a data series Link: https://github.com/tercen/seqlen_operator
file-conversion.html
4 File conversion
4 File conversion Description: Link:
statistical-testing.html
5 Statistical testing anova_operator ttest_operator lm_operator twogroupttest_operator mixed_model_operator

5 Statistical testing anova_operator Description: anova operator performs an analaysis of variance of the data Link: https://github.com/tercen/anova_operator ttest_operator Description: ttest operator performs a Student’s t-test on the data Link: https://github.com/tercen/ttest_operator lm_operator Description: The lm operator performs a linear regression in Tercen. Link: https://github.com/tercen/lm_operator twogroupttest_operator Description: twogroupttest operator performs a Student’s t-test on the data. Link: https://github.com/tercen/twogroupttest_operator mixed_model_operator Description: mixed model modelling of input data. Link: https://github.com/tercen/mixed_model_operator
data-visualisation.html
6 Data visualisation boxplot_shiny_operator shiny_heatmap_operator worldmap_shiny_docker_operator venn_shiny_operator shiny_boxplot_operator cellplot_shiny_operator

6 Data visualisation boxplot_shiny_operator Description: The Boxplot Shiny operator is an operator to represent data as boxplots in Tercen. Link: https://github.com/tercen/boxplot_shiny_operator shiny_heatmap_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/shiny_heatmap_operator worldmap_shiny_docker_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/worldmap_shiny_docker_operator venn_shiny_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/venn_shiny_operator shiny_boxplot_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/shiny_boxplot_operator cellplot_shiny_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/cellplot_shiny_operator
pairwise-distances.html
7 Pairwise distances RMSD_operator pairwise_RMSD_operator

7 Pairwise distances RMSD_operator Description: RMSD operator returns the Relative Mean Square Deviation of two variables. Link: https://github.com/tercen/RMSD_operator pairwise_RMSD_operator Description: The pairwise_RMSD operator returns the Relative Mean Squared Deviation computed between pairs of variables. Link: https://github.com/tercen/pairwise_RMSD_operator
dimensionality-reduction-and-clustering.html
8 Dimensionality reduction and clustering pca_operator MDS_operator umap_operator tsne_operator atsne_docker_operator fast_tSNE_operator clusterx2_operator

8 Dimensionality reduction and clustering pca_operator Description: pca operator performs principle component analysis. Link: https://github.com/tercen/pca_operator MDS_operator Description: MDS operator. Link: https://github.com/tercen/MDS_operator umap_operator Description: umap operator performs umap analysis. Link: https://github.com/tercen/umap_operator tsne_operator Description: tsne operator performs tSNE analysis. Link: https://github.com/tercen/tsne_operator atsne_docker_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/atsne_docker_operator fast_tSNE_operator Description: The Fast t-SNE operator performs the Fast Fourier Transform Interpolation-based t-SNE dimensionality reduction method. Link: https://github.com/tercen/fast_tSNE_operator clusterx2_operator Description: clusterx operator performs a fast clustering by automatic search and find of density peaks Link: https://github.com/tercen/clusterx2_operator
flow-cytometry.html
9 Flow Cytometry oldflowsom_operator rphenograph_operator cytonorm_operator flowsomtuning_operator diffcyt_operator flowai_operator somflow_operator flowsom_operator flowsom_mst_shiny_operator

9 Flow Cytometry oldflowsom_operator Description: flowsom operator performs the SOM (self organizing maps) in the flowSOM R package. Link: https://github.com/tercen/oldflowsom_operator rphenograph_operator Description: rephenograph operator performs a phenotype clustering in the Rphenograph R package. Link: https://github.com/tercen/rphenograph_operator cytonorm_operator Description: The Cytonorm operator normalizes cytometry data between mutliple batches. Link: https://github.com/tercen/cytonorm_operator flowsomtuning_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/flowsomtuning_operator diffcyt_operator Description: diffcyt operator a differential analysis of flow cyto data and indicates which marker and cluster combinations are relevant. Link: https://github.com/tercen/diffcyt_operator flowai_operator Description: flowai operator performs quality control on flowcytometry data. Link: https://github.com/tercen/flowai_operator somflow_operator Description: somflow operator performs the SOM (self organizing maps) in the FlowSOM R package. Link: https://github.com/tercen/somflow_operator flowsom_operator Description: FlowSOM operator for flow cytometry data. Link: https://github.com/tercen/flowsom_operator flowsom_mst_shiny_operator Description: The FlowSOM_MST operator for flow cytometry data creates the Minimum Spanning Tree based on FlowSOM clustering. Link: https://github.com/tercen/flowsom_mst_shiny_operator
rna-sequencing.html
10 RNA sequencing normalyzer_operator fgsea_operator scRNAseq_normalisation_operator scRNAseq_QC_operator scRNAseq_feature_selection_operator DESeq2_two_conditions_operator

10 RNA sequencing normalyzer_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/normalyzer_operator fgsea_operator Description: fgsea operator performs a fast gene set enrichment analysis. Link: https://github.com/tercen/fgsea_operator scRNAseq_normalisation_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/scRNAseq_normalisation_operator scRNAseq_QC_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/scRNAseq_QC_operator scRNAseq_feature_selection_operator Description: NA Link: https://github.com/tercen/scRNAseq_feature_selection_operator DESeq2_two_conditions_operator Description: DESeq2_two_conditions tests for differential gene expression in samples from two conditions using the DESeq2 package from BioConductor (Love, et al, Genome Biology, 2014). Link: https://github.com/tercen/DESeq2_two_conditions_operator
